name: Krito
description:
Krito is an unlucky boy who lost his coins on his way home and now you should help him find his loss through a variety of levels.

Control keys:

[Left Arrow] To move left

[Right Arrow] To move right

[Space] To jump

[P] To pause the game

[Escape] To commit suicide

This is my very first game on this engine so don't hesitate to give your criticisms.
